column1: Smoque BBQ////The best things about this place are the price and the smell.  They have good meat and decent mac and cheese
column2: though it was not everything some people have propped it up to be.  The sauce is way too thin though
column3: and the cole slaw was so overly sweet that I was unable to eat it.  As seems to be a common fallacy of Chicago's BBQ joints
column4: they did not have Texas toast.  They did have a very good soft drink selection
column6: but they have a lot to choose from.  I do have to say though that the staff was very good.  The place just didn't wow me overall like I had expected it to after reading about it online.
